component.name: Architecture
component.definition: Definition of component type Architecture required

component.name: ArchitectureKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type ArchitectureKeyProperties required

parameter.name: DesignIntent
parameter.definition: Definition of property name DesignIntent required

value.name: designed to support a specific model or modeling system

constraint.name: if DesignIntent is "designed to support a specific model or modeling system"

parameter.name: DesignFlexibility
parameter.definition: Definition of property name DesignFlexibility required

value.name: minor or moderate changes required to new model
major changes required to new model
minor or moderate changes required to framework

parameter.name: ControlMode
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ControlMode required

value.name: models retain control, calling library functions
control thread is in driver or framework itself

constraint.name: if ControlModel is "control thread is in driver or framework itself"

parameter.name: CustomizableDriver
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CustomizableDriver required

parameter.name: FeatureSupport
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FeatureSupport required
